name: Tsukumo Reiko's Summer Holidays
description:
"This is a game about a girl on her summer holidays. Enjoy and you'll hear from me again. From 'wonderweek'"

originally submitted to a game jam on a pre-lavendel site in 2002 believeinthe.net 1jam on may 27th 2022. In the spirit of the game jam, all music downloaded from avantasia.
